category-def.name: org.eclipse.e4.tools.spies.feature
category-def.label: Eclipse 4 - All Spies
category-def.description: Feature to group all spies into one feature.

category-def.name: org.eclipse.e4.tools.model.spy
category-def.label: Eclipse 4 - Model Spy
category-def.description: A spy to investigate and alter the Eclipse 4 runtime model. Formerly known as the "Live Editor".

category-def.name: org.eclipse.e4.tools.bundle.spy
category-def.label: Eclipse 4 - Bundle Spy
category-def.description: A spy to display all the bundles running in the application and to start or stop some of them.

category-def.name: org.eclipse.e4.tools.preference.spy
category-def.label: Eclipse 4 - Preference Spy
category-def.description: A spy to display recently changed or even all the preferences of the running application. You can see the notepaths, keys, new and old values of these preferences. See http://blog.vogella.com/2014/12/28/preferences-spy-for-eclipse-ide-and-rcp/
